acceleration: 30 ft. (current and muscle) or 15 ft. (muscle only)
propulsion: current (air; 10 squares of sails, hp 50), current (water), or muscle (pushed; 40 Medium rowers)
driving_space: the two middle rear squares of the longship
maximum_speed: 120 ft. (current and muscle) or 30 ft. (muscle only)
decks: 1 (with small cargo area under the deck)
name: Longship
driving_check: Diplomacy or Intimidate while rowed, or Profession (sailor) or Knowledge (nature) +10 to the DC when sail is used
